title.rendered: CCSD Hosts Family Academy Workshops, Oct. 19

content.rendered:
The Clark County School District (CCSD) Family Engagement Department invites families to attend Family Academy for free workshops and resources to support the academic success of your child. 

The Family Academy will be held on Saturday, October 19, 2024, from 9:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. at Cheyenne High School located at 3200 W Alexander Rd, North Las Vegas, NV 89032. A light breakfast will be served.   

Families interested in attending are asked to register for the event by Friday, October 18, 2024, by visiting http://bit.ly/Oct19FA or emailing familyengagement@nv.ccsd.net. Spanish translation services will be provided at the event. 

You can learn more about the Family Academy as well as all the resources offered by the CCSD Family Engagement Department by visiting engage.ccsd.net/family.
